Kavir Kaycee

Hi! I'm a product manager, writer, and builder based in Bombay, India. Led product management for several Tier 1 VC (Accel, Sequoia) funded startups including CarDekho and Hashnode. Worked across B2B and B2C in the spaces of auto, fintech, AI, workplace collaboration, media and content. Ex-founder of a bootstrapped HR Tech startup. I advise and consult with startups, and write two newsletters - The Discourse and No-code Shots. ISB and On Deck alum. I also tinker with side projects built with AI and no-code.
